info.title: Velorena API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Velorena Backend - Authentication and User Management

get.description: Retrieve all appointments for the authenticated user with filtering, sorting, and pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in service type, description, or notes

post.description: Create a new appointment with optional designer assignment. The appointment will be created with 'pending' status and can be claimed by designers later. Use the available-slots endpoint to check for available time slots before booking.

designer_id.description: Designer ID (optional - can be assigned later)

appointment_date.description: Appointment date (must be today or future)

appointment_time.description: Appointment time (HH:MM) - must be from available slots

description.description: Detailed description of the service needed
description.example: Need help with living room design

order_notes.description: Notes related to the linked order

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific appointment

put.description: Update an existing appointment (only if status is pending or confirmed)

400.description: Validation error or cannot modify appointment

delete.description: Cancel a specific appointment (only if status is pending or confirmed)

get.description: Retrieve available time slots for today or a specific date. This endpoint shows real-time availability by excluding already booked appointments. Returns 30-minute slots from 8 AM to 4 PM for all 7 days of the week (Monday-Sunday).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for available slots (optional, defaults to today). Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Must be today or in the future.

available_slots.description: Array of available time slots in HH:MM format

slot_duration.description: Duration of each slot in minutes

422.description: Validation failed - Invalid date format or past date

items.example: The date must be a date after or equal to today.

post.description: Register a new user with the provided information

client_type.description: Type of client account - individual person or company

full_name.description: Full name of the individual or primary contact person

contact_person.description: Name of the contact person for company accounts

email.description: Valid email address for account login and communications

phone.description: Phone number with country code for contact purposes

address.description: Street address for billing and delivery purposes

city.description: City name for billing and delivery purposes

country.description: Country name for billing and delivery purposes

vat_number.description: VAT registration number for tax purposes (optional)

cr_number.description: Commercial registration number for business accounts (optional)

notes.description: Additional notes or special requirements for the account

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password. Returns a Bearer token for API access.

email.description: Registered email address for the account

post.description: Logout the authenticated user and invalidate their token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information. Only non-sensitive fields can be updated.

client_type.description: Type of client account - individual person or company

full_name.description: Full name of the individual or primary contact person

contact_person.description: Name of the contact person for company accounts

phone.description: Phone number with country code for contact purposes

address.description: Street address for billing and delivery purposes

city.description: City name for billing and delivery purposes

country.description: Country name for billing and delivery purposes

vat_number.description: VAT registration number for tax purposes (optional)

cr_number.description: Commercial registration number for business accounts (optional)

notes.description: Additional notes or special requirements for the account

items.example: The full name field is required.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of active categories with optional search functionality. Categories are sorted by sort_order and then by name.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search categories by name in English or Arabic. Performs partial matching on category names.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Starts from 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of categories to return per page. Minimum: 1, Maximum: 100, Default: 15.

description.example: Professional business cards for companies and individuals

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific category

description.example: Professional business cards for companies and individuals

post.description: Upload a document (CR document or VAT document) for the authenticated user. Supported file types: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, DOCX. Maximum file size: 10MB.

type.description: Type of document being uploaded. 'cr_document' for Commercial Registration documents, 'vat_document' for VAT registration documents.

document.description: Document file to upload. Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, DOCX. Maximum file size: 10MB. File should be clear and readable.

delete.description: Delete a document (CR document or VAT document) for the authenticated user. This will remove the file from storage and clear the reference from the user's profile.

type.description: Type of document to delete. 'cr_document' for Commercial Registration documents, 'vat_document' for VAT registration documents. This will permanently remove the document from storage.

get.description: Get information about a specific document (CR document or VAT document) for the authenticated user, including file details and download URL.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of document to get info for

filename.description: Original filename of the uploaded document

url.description: Public URL to access/download the document

exists.description: Whether the file exists in storage

uploaded_at.description: Timestamp when the document was uploaded

get.description: Retrieve all orders for the authenticated user with filtering, sorting, and pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in order number or phone

post.description: Create a new order with products and options

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific order

delete.description: Delete a specific order (only if status is pending)

post.description: Send a one-time password (OTP) to the user's email, phone, or WhatsApp. The OTP can be used for verification purposes.

identifier.description: Email address or phone number where the OTP will be sent. For email OTP, use a valid email format. For SMS/WhatsApp, use international phone number format with country code.

type.description: Delivery method for the OTP. 'email' sends via email, 'sms' sends via text message, 'whatsapp' sends via WhatsApp, 'fake' generates a test OTP for development

expiry_minutes.description: Number of minutes before the OTP expires. Must be between 1-60 minutes. Default is 10 minutes if not specified.

post.description: Verify the OTP code sent to the user. The code must be exactly 6 digits and not expired.

identifier.description: Email address or phone number that was used when the OTP was sent. Must match exactly with the identifier used in the send-otp request.

code.description: 6-digit OTP code received via the specified delivery method. Must be exactly 6 characters long.

type.description: Delivery method that was used to send the OTP. Must match the type used in the send-otp request.

post.description: Resend a new OTP to the user. This will invalidate any previous OTP and generate a new one.

identifier.description: Email address or phone number where the new OTP will be sent. Must be the same identifier used in the original send-otp request.

type.description: Delivery method for the new OTP. Must be the same type used in the original send-otp request.

expiry_minutes.description: Number of minutes before the new OTP expires. Must be between 1-60 minutes. Default is 10 minutes if not specified.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of active products with optional filtering by category and search functionality. Products include their options and values for customization.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Filter products by specific category ID. Only products from this category will be returned.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search products by name in English or Arabic. Performs partial matching on product names.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Starts from 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of products to return per page. Minimum: 1, Maximum: 100, Default: 15.

description.example: Professional business cards with various customization options

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product including its options and values

description.example: Professional business cards with various customization options

tags.name: Appointments
tags.description: Complete appointment management system - Create, read, update, and manage appointments with real-time availability checking

tags.name: Availability
tags.description: Real-time availability checking - Get available time slots for booking appointments
